UnitType.Backstory: A Spirit Totem is a mystic reflection of a shaman's true nature, given embodiment in the form of a wild creature. Shamans discover their spirit totem in a variety of means; Ayman undertook a vision quest where he fasted in the wilderness until the Spirit Totem appeared.

Wargs are fell creatures, wolves mutated by dark magics thousands of years ago. They are stronger and more cunning than their non-magical counterparts. They prefer to hunt alone, and will fight over territory rather than ally themselves with their brethren. The Ice Warg is characterized by its whitish-gray pelt and affinity for cold regions.

UnitType.Quote: 'My blade hungers for the blood of man.'
'Created to Destroy, I await one powerful enough to serve.'
UnitType.Backstory:
Animated by the Anima Tsa Animana. Crafted from volcanic glass or lava rock, these creatures are most often found among the ruins of the great cities of man, though from time to time they are uncovered in more unusual locales.
When an Obsidian Golem is destroyed it reverts back to the lava rock it was prior to enchantment.

UnitType.Description: Defenders are formidable troops that are able to outlast enemy units and absorb lots of damage.

Horsemen are excellent for scouting out unknown areas, and escaping when they uncover dangers in those areas.
Nothing matches the savegry of a Juggernaut. Your enemies should be afraid, but your allies are also at risk from the Juggernaut's frenzied attacks.
Slayers are the most expensive and powerful units that can be trained. They combine the best armor, weapons and enchanted items with reliable mounts and advanced training.

Spearmen are effective against well armored enemies.
